sentence.Network_en: Please no unpolite words, no privacy, at least ten words every time.
sentence.Network_cn: 请不要使用不礼貌的字眼, 不能涉及个人隐私, 每次发贴至少10个字.

sentence.Network_en: So, it's unpolite to smoke in these people's presence.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有许多人不能忍受烟味,在他们面前吸烟是极端不礼貌的.

sentence.Network_en: We cannot allow this unpolite behavior at school.
sentence.Network_cn: 在学校我们不允许这种不礼貌的行为.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Those people unpolite will pay for it sooner or later ., 那些不懂礼貌的人迟早要为此付出代价.

list.abs: We cannot allow this unpolite behavior at school ., 在学校我们不允许这种不礼貌的行为.

auth_sentence.content: I don't want to say this, but this kind of actions are unpolite and devoided of any law background, support or rationale.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't want to say this, but this kind of actions are unpolite and devoided of any law background, support or rationale.
